0001.developer_comment: The day where Watase heard the truth of the Great Rokumei City Arson. He comes to know why the incident occurred...
0001.string: 得知鹿鸣市连环火灾真相的那一天。渡濑知道了元凶是谁、是怎么一回事……

0003.developer_comment: And so Watase asks: what happened to Rokumei City and LABO after Communicator A's death...?
0003.string: 然后渡濑追问着。在 Communicator A 死后，鹿鸣市和 LABO 到底做了什么……

0005.developer_comment: The day Watase decided to join Q. To understand Ukita's intentions, Watase asks why the researcher would betray LABO...
0005.string: 决定加入 Q 的那天。渡濑为了寻求能够让自己接受的理由，向宇喜多询问“背叛 LABO 的动机”……

0007.developer_comment: The day they started cooking up the terrorist plot. Ukita tells Watase what Q's objective is for the first time...
0007.string: 开始策划恐怖袭击计划那天的事。渡濑第一次从宇喜多那里得知 Q 的目的是什么……

0009.developer_comment: A few hours ago. Watase plans to gun down the inhuman monsters known as Communicators...
0009.string: 几个小时前。渡濑打算用枪打死 Communicator，这种非人的怪物……

0011.developer_comment: When he discovers the room with three corpses, Ukita's doubts surrounding Watase explode...
0011.string: 在那个房间里发现三具尸体的时候，宇喜多心中对渡濑的怀疑爆发了……

0013.developer_comment: As he goes with Watase towards the sprinkler system, Ukita subtly tries to confirm whether or not Watase really lost his memories...
0013.string: 宇喜多一边和渡濑一起前往灭火系统下方，一边若无其事地确认渡濑是否真的丧失了记忆……

0015.developer_comment: Right when he sees Ena starting up computers in LABO, Dr. Tenkawa's words echo through Ukita's head...
0015.string: 看到惠那启动 LABO 的电脑的瞬间，宇喜多脑海里浮现出天川博士说过的话……

0017.developer_comment: It was then that Ukita encountered Subject N's body...
0017.string: 这时，宇喜多见到了实验对象 N 的尸体……

0018.developer_comment: It was then that Ukita discovered Subject N's body...
0018.string: 这时，宇喜多发现了少女的尸体……

0020.developer_comment: An amnesiac captain and an acidic teacher. All the adults Jun encounter in this extreme situation are ones with those negative traits...
0020.string: 丧失记忆的队长和气势汹汹叫嚷的女老师。洵在极限状况中遇到的成年人，都是有着怪癖的……

0022.developer_comment: A hallway shrouded in smoke. Jun decides to pull back at the sight, but Ena flares up at her again...
0022.string: 过道上弥漫着烟雾。看到这情景，洵决定回去的时候，惠那又开始找茬了……

0024.developer_comment: Though Jun found Dojima's body, there was no time to grieve. But after overcoming many hardships, she finally gets a moment to rest...
0024.string: 即使目睹到堂岛的死，也没有时间悲伤，克服了重重困难，洵终于得以短暂地歇息歇息……

0026.developer_comment: Hiyama's body showed up as if to crush their hopes. Jun is heartbroken, but finds an unexpected someone giving her strength...
0026.string: 桧山的尸体出现代表着对希望的践踏。这时，给了内心崩溃的洵一针强心剂是……

0027.developer_comment: After passing many trials to make it to that room, Jun discovers the body of a mysterious girl...
0027.string: 在历经千辛万苦终于到达的房间里，洵发现了陌生少女的尸体……

0028.developer_comment: Jun discovers the body of a mysterious girl in that room...
0028.string: 洵在那个房间里发现了一具陌生少女的尸体……

0030.developer_comment: Kazami reunited with Watase, only to find he'd lost his memory. She decides to harden her heart to get out of this situation alive...
0030.string: 在 LABO 中再次见到的渡濑，已经失去了全部的记忆。风见为了在这个现场生存下去，下定决心要严阵以待……

0031.developer_comment: In the midst of their already unfavorable situation, the corpses of two of Kazami's rescue squad coworkers lie in wait...
0031.string: 事态没有任何好转，等待风见他们的是一名救援人员和两名被困人员的尸体……

0032.developer_comment: Hiyama's body is found just an hour after Dojima's. Kazami tries to hide her distress behind a mask of bravery, but...
0032.string: 发现堂岛的尸体一小时后，又发现了桧山的尸体。风见抑制住内心的动摇，想要贯彻自己毅然决然的态度……

0033.developer_comment: And then Kazami discovered Subject N's body...
0033.string: 然后风见，发现了实验对象 N 的尸体……

0035.developer_comment: Four years ago. Ukita achieves his longtime dream of being employed in LABO, and meets Dr. Tenkawa...
0035.string: 四年前。宇喜多如愿以偿地进入了 LABO ，在那里遇到了天川博士……

0037.developer_comment: Two years ago. Dr. Tenkawa entrusts Ukita with a certain job. He willingly accepts it, and then...
0037.string: 两年前，天川博士委派了宇喜多一项工作。于是，宇喜多爽快地答应了……

0039.developer_comment: Ukita's lonely battle began from the night he discovered the truth about LABO. Then one day, his phone rings...
0039.string: 从知道 LABO 真相的那个夜晚开始，宇喜多开始了独狼的战斗。有一天，宇喜多的电话响了……

0041.developer_comment: Ukita and his new ally steadily prepared for the terrorist plot. But the security department then turns their eyes on Ukita...
0041.string: 得到了可以信赖的伙伴，宇喜多稳步进行着恐怖袭击的准备。但是安保部的目光开始转向宇喜多……

0043.developer_comment: D-day then arrived. The plan looked like it was going off without a hitch. But what Ukita finds waiting for him is his comrades' harsh betrayal...
0043.string: 然后到了命运之日。计划进行得很顺利，然而等待宇喜多的，却是同伴的无情背叛……

0045.developer_comment: Back when Ukita was still observing Natsuhiko. He has a conversation with Dr. Tenkawa about the past and future of the Communicators...
0045.string: 那时宇喜多还在执行夏彦的监视任务。宇喜多有一天和天川博士讨论了 Communicator 的过去和未来……

0047.developer_comment: The day Ukita became a Q member. Ukita asks the other Q member about the history of Q...
0047.string: 加入 Q之后的某一天。宇喜多向 Q 的人询问了起了 Q 的历史……

0049.developer_comment: Nine years ago. Mashiro gets into an argument with Natsuhiko when he insists on going to LABO...
0049.string: 9年前。夏彦不听真白的劝阻，说要去 LABO ，二人便吵了起来……

0051.developer_comment: One week after Yuuri's funeral. Mashiro visits Natsuhiko in the hospital, only to find him in a shocking state...
0051.string: 悠里的葬礼结束，又过了一周的时候。去探望夏彦时， 眼前的他已经面目全非……

0053.developer_comment: Three months passed after Natsuhiko's coma began. The day Mashiro had awaited finally arrives: Natsuhiko's day of awakening...
0053.string: 夏彦三个月间一直没有醒来。真白一直期望着夏彦能够醒来，这一天终于来临……

0055.developer_comment: Nine years after the incident at LABO. Natsuhiko averts his eyes from reality. Mashiro keeps telling him white lies...
0055.string: LABO 的事故已经过去九年了。从那天起夏彦就一直在回避现实，而真白一直对他诉说着温柔的谎言……

0057.developer_comment: Mashiro is fine with Natsuhiko as he is. But a visit to the park serves as a bitter reminder of Mashiro's past...
0057.string: 真白对现在的夏彦没有不满。但是，在偶然路过的公园里，她想起了过去，感到了无可奈何的悲伤……

0059.developer_comment: Before becoming his friend, Mashiro hears a rumor about Natsuhiko getting a girlfriend. Mashiro goes to meet this girl...
0059.string: 这是还没有和夏彦成为好友时的记忆。听说夏彦有了恋人的真白，决定去见那个女孩……

0061.developer_comment: Yuuri, Natsuhiko, and Mashiro became friends. They test their courage at a ruined building on the outskirts of town...
0061.string: 夏彦和真白关系变得很好，悠里也开始一起玩的某一天。三个人来到城外的废墟试胆……

0063.developer_comment: After Natsuhiko heard Mashiro's story about the terrorist but refused to take her seriously. Mashiro begins to look for the terrorist alone...
0063.string: 在夏彦对谈及的恐怖分子一事置之不理后。真白一个人开始搜索恐怖分子……

0065.developer_comment: A memory of not too long ago. A thought coiled itself in Mashiro's mind ever since she learned Yuuri was alive...
0065.string: 通过刚刚的记忆知道悠里还活着之后，真白回想起自己心中一直有个疙瘩……

0067.developer_comment: Right after Salyu moves in, Dr. Tenkawa secretly explains the details to Mashiro. Mashiro confesses her concealed feelings...
0067.string: 纱瑠来到天川家的那天晚上。当天川博士暗地里过来说明情况时，真白说出了自己的想法……

0069.developer_comment: Sixteen years ago, when Ena was still eight. Her beloved father worked at a certain research facility...
0069.string: 十六年前。惠那才八岁的时候。她最喜欢的父亲，在某个研究设施工作……

0071.developer_comment: With her dear father gone, Ena followed in his footsteps. And so, 13 years later, she finds employment in the same place as her father...
0071.string: 失去了最爱的父亲后，惠那继续追寻着亡父的足迹。十三年后，她进入了和父亲一样的职场……

0073.developer_comment: After two years as a Communicator commissioner, Ena is tasked with being a teacher at Rokumei Academy...
0073.string: 在担任Communicator管理官两年后的某一天。惠那被赋予的任务是成为鹿鸣学园的教师……

0075.developer_comment: Ena led a double life as teacher and commissioner. Doubting LABO, she requests her group conduct a secret inspection...
0075.string: 在继续教师和管理官的双重生活中，惠那对 LABO 的疑惑感逐渐加深，终于向上司提议进行潜入调查……

0077.developer_comment: D-day arrives. Ena and her two superiors infiltrate LABO. But what lies in wait there is a nightmare far beyond their imaginations...
0077.string: 然后命运之日来临。惠那和两位上司一起潜入了 LABO 。然而等待他们的，却是超乎想象的噩梦……

0079.developer_comment: As a Communicator commissioner, Ena secretly meets Dr. Tenkawa and tries to ask her about her true intentions...
0079.string: 和天川博士秘密见面时的记忆。惠那作为 Communicator 管理官，试着问出了天川博士的真意……

0081.developer_comment: Ena thinks to herself on her last day as a teacher. When Natsuhiko, Mashiro, and Salyu arrive, Ena begins her final lesson...
0081.string: 作为教师度过的最后一天。惠那心中萦绕着各种各样的思绪。然后夏彦他们来访，惠那的最后一课开始了……

0083.developer_comment: Is Captain Kasasagi a terrorist? Every time that doubt plays in Ena's head, anxiety continues to sway her heart...
0083.string: 队长是恐怖分子吗？每当这种怀疑掠过脑海，惠那的心就会持续摇摆……

0085.developer_comment: As Ena carries an unconscious Watase out of a contaminated zone, she remembers a dog she once owned...
0085.string: 渡濑从污染区域昏迷着回来的时候——惠那抱着渡濑一边走，一边想起了以前养的狗的事……

0087.developer_comment: Salyu was in a cold, jail-like room. But that facility was her entire world...
0087.string: 纱瑠待在像牢房一样冷冰冰的房间里。而那个设施，正是纱瑠世界的全部……

0089.developer_comment: Salyu's days without freedom went on and on. Then one day, she asks Dr. Tenkawa about her own birth...
0089.string: 纱瑠就这么过着没有自由的日子。有一天，纱瑠问了天川博士关于自己出生的问题……

0091.developer_comment: --The end comes suddenly. One day, Salyu suddenly loses the sole meaning of her existence...
0091.string: 结束来得太突然了。那一天，纱瑠失去了自己唯一存在的意义……

0093.developer_comment: Dr. Tenkawa asks Salyu if she wants to be free. It is then that Salyu first realizes her true feelings...
0093.string: 纱瑠向天川博士询问是否想要自由的问题。那时，纱瑠第一次发现了自己的真实想法……

0095.developer_comment: Salyu loses her "past". In exchange, she gains "the outside world", "a partner" and "a role"...
0095.string: 纱瑠失去了“往日的日常”。取而代之的是“外面的世界”、“伙伴”和“任务”……

0097.developer_comment: Salyu found herself in a world with endless surprises. But she eventually finds herself enjoying such a world for what it is...
0097.string: 那是一个困惑无尽的世界。但不知不觉间，纱瑠发现自己对这些事情都乐在其中……

0099.developer_comment: The fateful day. After Salyu gets separated from Natsuhiko and Mashiro, she begins her solitary battle to save her dear friends...
0099.string: 命运之日来临。与夏彦他们分头行动的纱瑠，为了拯救重要之人，开始了只有一个人的战斗……

0101.developer_comment: A memory of when Salyu was nine years old. She finds a deep interest in the moving stars and the many stories revolving around them...
0101.string: 9岁左右时。纱瑠最感兴趣的就是天上变幻的星星，以及星空中发生的各种故事……

0103.developer_comment: Back at the abandoned hospital, when Mashiro revealed she could use empathy. Salyu ponders about Alice and Mashiro...
0103.string: 在废弃的医院里，真白知道了自己可以使用读心时。纱瑠想到了爱丽丝和真白……

0105.developer_comment: Kazami shook Salyu off, knocking her out at the bottom of the stairs. Salyu then dreams of an unknown day in the far off past...
0105.string: 被风见甩下，昏倒在楼梯上的时候。不知何时，纱瑠梦见了遥远的过去……

0107.developer_comment: An hour ago. As she worries over Natsuhiko and the others' safety, Salyu finds herself thinking about Natsuhiko for some reason...
0107.string: 大约一个小时前。担心夏彦他们的纱瑠，不知为何想起了和夏彦的回忆……

0109.developer_comment: Salyu has a conversation with Mashiro in the karaoke box and comes to learn that everyone has their mysteries about them...
0109.string: 在卡拉 OK 时的记忆。纱瑠在和真白的对话中，明白了每个人都有解不开的谜团……

0111.developer_comment: Sixteen years ago, 16-year-old Watase was relaxing in his room when he heard a girl's voice...
0111.string: 十六年前。渡濑十六岁的时候。他在自己的房间里享受着平静的时光，这时传来了她的声音……

0113.developer_comment: Watase trained his endurance alongside Wataru to fulfill her dream. Along the way, they discuss the Communicator situation...
0113.string: 渡濑听了亘的梦想，和她一起努力锻炼体力。渡濑在闲暇之时和她交换了对于 Communicator 的意见……

0115.developer_comment: Watase was hospitalized with a broken leg. But one night, something happens that would decisively change his fate forever...
0115.string: 脚部骨折的渡濑住进了医院。但是在某个夜晚，发生了一件彻底改变渡濑命运的事情……

0117.developer_comment: Nine years ago, seven years after Wataru's death. A dispatch sends Watase, now a rescue worker, to a certain disaster site...
0117.string: 九年前。亘死后的第七年。成为救援队员的渡濑，来到了某个事故现场……

0119.developer_comment: One year ago. Watase's satisfying life changes forever when he receives a phone call that turns his life upside-down...
0119.string: 然后时间来到一年前。每天过着充实生活的渡濑接到了一个电话，动摇了他的人生……

0120.developer_comment: After a month of consideration, Watase resolves himself to join Ukita. From that day onwards, they begin planning their attack...
0120.string: 纠结了一个月之后，渡濑下定决心要成为宇喜多的同志。于是从那天起，渡濑他们开始酝酿这个计划……

0122.developer_comment: With three days to go until they launch their terrorist plot, Watase spends his last day off as a rescue worker...
0122.string: 距离实施恐怖袭击还有三天时。渡濑度过了作为救援队员迎接的最后一个假日……

0123.developer_comment: D-day at last. Watase and his comrades headed to the deepest level of LABO, only to find a lone girl...
0123.string: 命运之日来临。渡濑和同伴一起侵入到了 LABO 的最深处，在那里和一名少女相接触……

0125.developer_comment: Right after the Procyon's warning alarm goes off in Area N, something pierces its way into Watase's head...
0125.string: 在 N 区域 Procyon 响起警报声的时候，渡濑的脑海仿佛被什么东西穿透了……

0127.developer_comment: Three years ago, in front of the fire station. Watase encounters the older sister of the girl he couldn't save...
0127.string: 3年前的一天。渡濑在鹿鸣市消防局前，遇到了自己曾经没能救下的少女的姐姐……

0129.developer_comment: Around the time Kazami began to call Watase "Captain", the two happened to come across each other at the bus station after work...
0129.string: 那是风见开始叫称呼他“队长”时候的事。渡濑下班后在公交车站，碰巧遇到了风见……

0131.developer_comment: Kazami started acting weird a day after a harsh scolding from Watase. At first, Watase believed she hated him, but...
0131.string: 被渡濑狠狠训斥一顿后的第二天，风见的样子变很奇怪。起初渡濑还以为她是讨厌自己了……

0133.developer_comment: Watase started going out with Kazami. When she confesses to him about the anxiety she feels, his response is...
0133.string: 渡濑开始和风见交往。风见说出了自己的不安，渡濑告诉她的是……

0135.developer_comment: A memory of some night in the past...
0135.string: 不知何时的，一个夜晚的记忆……

0137.developer_comment: One night a year ago, Watase realized that to continue being a terrorist, he must give up his days of joy...
0137.string: 一年前的一个夜晚。作为恐怖分子继续活动的渡濑，告别了幸福的日子……

0139.developer_comment: Nine years ago. Kazami was 19. Though her parents were gone, she lived her days happily together with her dear sister Nagisa...
0139.string: 九年前。风见十九岁的时候。她虽然父母双亡，但和妹妹凪沙相处融洽，过着平静的日子……

0141.developer_comment: The day before Nagisa was set to enroll in elementary school. On the way home, Kazami spots a truly unbelievable sight...
0141.string: 就在凪沙的小学开学前一天。回到家的风见看到的，是令人难以置信的景象……

0143.developer_comment: Kazami became a rescue worker after four years of firefighting. She visits her future workplace, reuniting with "him"...
0143.string: 成为消防员后的第四年春天。终于成为救援队员的风见，在被分配到的地方，与他重逢了……

0144.developer_comment: Kazami's days as a rescue worker flew by. Then came the fateful day. Kazami and her squadmates hurry over to LABO...
0144.string: 作为救援队员的日子飞逝而过。终于来到了命运之日。风见和同伴们一起赶往 LABO……

0146.developer_comment: A memory of back when Nagisa was still alive. On that day, she asks her older sister Kazami to buy a certain something...
0146.string: 凪沙还活着的时候的记忆。那天，风见在凪沙的央求下，买了一件东西……

0148.developer_comment: Two months after Kazami enlisted in Sirius. Watase questions Kazami on why she was wearing a certain something...
0148.string: 风见进入 Sirius 的第二个月。风见随身带着的东西，被渡濑发现了……

0150.developer_comment: About a week ago. Kazami receives an e-mail from a junior fire inspector about the incident entwined so deeply with her...
0150.string: 大约一周前的事。风见从后辈火灾调查员那里收到了一封有关那场事故的邮件……

0152.developer_comment: Half a year after Kazami enlisted in Sirius, she finds herself anguishing alone after attending a classical music concert with Watase.
0152.string: 加入Sirius 大约半年后的某一天。前一天和渡濑一起欣赏了古典音乐会的风见，独自苦闷着……

0154.developer_comment: The summer Natsuhiko met Yuuri, they embark on a journey to find the truth behind the "Seven Wonders of Rokumei City".
0154.string: 遥远往日的回忆。这是夏彦与悠里相遇后的第一个暑假。夏彦他们试图解开“鹿鸣市七大不可思议”之谜。

0156.developer_comment: A day one year after Natsuhiko's father died. Natsuhiko hears stories of him from his mother.
0156.string: 夏彦的父亲死后一年的某一天。夏彦从母亲那里听到了关于亡父的回忆。

0158.developer_comment: Natsuhiko had just advanced to high school. Mashiro starts coming to his house to cook his meals for him each day.
0158.string: 夏彦刚进鹿鸣学园的时候，因为每天吃饭都很困难，真白决定亲自来做饭。

0160.developer_comment: After a fight with Mashiro over the existence of terrorists in town, Natsuhiko shared an irrational, yet warm memory with Salyu.
0160.string: 夏彦和真白因为恐怖袭击的真伪而争吵分离的那个夜晚。夏彦与纱瑠之间有过一段荒诞而温馨的回忆。

0162.developer_comment:
At a place out of time. At a time out of place.
"You" watch memories of nine.
And meet "her" face to face.
0162.string: 实际并不存在的时间与空间中。“你”围绕着九个人的记忆旅程的尽头处，遇到了“她”。

0164.developer_comment: Eleven years ago. Jun ran from home after a fight with her father. She then gets a warm greeting from none other than...
0164.string: 十一岁时的记忆。洵和父亲吵架后离家出走，而充满热情迎接她的人是……

0166.developer_comment: Jun and Nagisa buy a present for Kazami. But later that day, an incident would cause Jun's fate to spiral out of control...
0166.string: 洵和凪沙一起去给风见买礼物了。那一天，发生了一起颠覆洵命运的事故……

0168.developer_comment: Kazami lost her mental stability after her sister's death. "How can I support Kazami?" Jun desperately wonders what to do...
0168.string: 妹妹的死，让风见失去了内心的平静。怎样才能支持风见呢？洵拼命地思考，自己能做什么……

0169.developer_comment: After endless effort, Jun finally becomes a rescue worker. But then the fateful day came on September 16, 2030...
0169.string: 经过难以言述的巨大努力，洵终于被分配进了救援队。然后到了2030年9月16日。命运之日到临了……

0171.developer_comment: Three years ago, when Jun was in high school, she'd hang out with Kazami. But one day, Jun notices something off about her...
0171.string: 大约三年前。洵还是高中生的时候。洵和风见一起到逛街游玩。但是她发现风见的样子很奇怪……

0173.developer_comment: Jun's first day of work as a rescue worker. She meets a man with a sour face and harsh tongue at the fire department...
0173.string: 被分配到救援队后的第一个上班日。洵在消防局内遇到了一个眼神和嘴巴都恶狠狠的男人……

0175.developer_comment: Three days ago, when Jun was providing local disaster prevention guidance, she had a surprise encounter with some familiar faces...
0175.string: 三天前，为了防灾指导巡视各个公共设施时发生的事。洵在某个设施里，看到了意料之外的人物……

0177.developer_comment: Explosions and fires plague the PRC. Unable to accept her captain's orders, Jun tries rushing into the building all by herself...
0177.string: 超心研遭受了爆炸和火灾的影响。洵不顾队长的命令，想一个人冲进现场……

0179.developer_comment: Nine years ago, Natsuhiko and Yuuri got caught up in the LABO incident. Dr. Tenkawa saves them with only moments to spare...
0179.string: 9年前。和夏彦一起被卷入 LABO 事故的那一天。千钧一发之际，天川博士救出了两人……

0181.developer_comment: After Yuuri receives an examination and is discovered to have gone through some great changes, she is forced into a certain choice...
0181.string: 接受检查后，被发现身体上出现了重大变化的悠里，被迫做出了某个选择……

0183.developer_comment: Yuuri's days of experimentation at LABO began. She is taught how BC particles relate to the brain and gradually, her BC ability grows...
0183.string: 每天都在 LABO 里做实验。BC粒子与大脑的关系逐渐被探明。在那之中悠里的 BC 能力切实提高了……

0185.developer_comment: One day three months after coming to LABO. Yuuri learns about the true intention behind the repeated experiments from Dr. Tenkawa...
0185.string: 来到 LABO 三个月后的某一天。悠里从天川博士那里，被告知了反复实验的真意……

0187.developer_comment: Yuuri was determined to erase herself from Natsuhiko's mind. But as she erases his memories, her own emotions start to overflow...
0187.string: 悠里决心让自己从夏彦的心中消失。但是在消除夏彦的记忆的过程中，悠里心中的想法满溢而出……

0189.developer_comment: Two months ago, Yuuri's ninth encounter with Natsuhiko since the incident. Yuuri notices the feelings her best friend has kept hidden...
0189.string: 两个月前，和夏彦迎来第九次重逢的那天。悠里，注意到了挚友隐藏的感情……

0191.developer_comment: The fateful day arrives. Fires and explosions rage throughout LABO as Yuuri begins working to save Natsuhiko and his friends...
0191.string: 命运之日来临。LABO 内发生了爆炸和火灾，悠里为了拯救夏彦他们开始了行动……

0193.developer_comment:
"Restart Natsuhiko's stopped time"
--Yuuri thought her efforts to accomplish that feat were going well, but then...
0193.string: “让9年前夏彦停止的时间，再次流动”——本以为，悠里的这次尝试一切都很顺利……

0195.developer_comment: Yuuri woke up in a world of smoke and flame... She ran around, driven by the desire to live. She then once again encounters "him"...
0195.string: 睁开双眼，这是个充满火与焦热的世界……我不想死。带着这样的想法，在逃离的地方，悠里和他再次相遇了……

0197.developer_comment: A few days after Yuuri ran away from home with Natsuhiko. At the park, she learns of the emotions imbued within Natsuhiko's watch...
0197.string: 和夏彦一起离家出走的几天后。悠里在公园里，知道了夏彦的手表里蕴含的感情……

0199.developer_comment: The first summer break Yuuri spent with Natsuhiko and Mashiro. To end their constant bickering and reconcile their differences, she...
0199.string: 和夏彦还有真白一起度过的第一个暑假。无法忍受不断的争吵，为了让二人重归于好，悠里考虑的方法是……

0201.developer_comment: A day before the incident. Yuuri receives a lecture from Dr. Tenkawa about the experiment to take place the next day...
0201.string: 事件发生前一天。悠里从天川博士那里知道了“9月16日的实验”的大概……

0203.developer_comment: Tanabata, one year ago. Yuuri's thoughts turn to the other her within Natsuhiko's mind...
0203.string: 距今一年前的七夕。悠里牵挂着夏彦心中的另一个自己……
